abstract: Iranian Foreign Min Mohammad Javad Zarif, at United Nations conference at New York University, says United States risks global ostracism if it abandons Nuclear Nonproliferation Treaty, international nuclear pact that resolves Iranian nuclear dispute
lead_paragraph: Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif also said he was optimistic that the final phase of talks to reach a nuclear agreement would succeed.

headline.main: Iran’s Foreign Minister Says U.S. Risks Ostracism if Signed Nuclear Deal Is Scrapped
headline.print_headline: Iran Official, in U.S., Takes a Cordial Tone

snippet: Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif also said he was optimistic that the final phase of talks to reach a nuclear agreement would succeed.
